segments.text: I'm sorry to trouble you , but I'd like to ask when I will get a raise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You said the same thing three months ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did I ? Well , anyway , you will get your raise when the economy starts picking up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean that I won't get a raise until the recession ends ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got the message . I'm quiting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nah , don't be so fast . We like your work here , but this company is on hard times and I can't be handing out raises for anyone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been here for 3 years , and I haven't had a raise in all that time . If you like my work , it should be reflected in my pay , and I feel it isn't .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hear what you're saying , and I wish there were something I could do .
segments.speaker: S2
